title: Network Error then Low Priority Queue
body:
Hello,

I just entered a game and was in pick and couldn't lock in my pick due to a connection issue. I clicked and clicked and the timer continued to drain. Eventually it got to zero, froze at zero for a while and then I went back to home screen. I tried to load another game and now I'm stuck in low priority queue, what the hell is that? I need to play 5 games with this low priority queue now because of a server issue?

replies.body:
I can't find a record of any service issues that would impact your ability to stay connected to champ select. Most of these issues are directly caused by local network settings that conflict with League, so I recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address any unoptimized configurations you may be running.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
